name: Just do IT
description:
Game made during Slavic Game Jam 2015 using Unreal Engine 4, finished in a week

Hey!

As a new IT guy in our company your task is to fix things. Our well qualified workers can't work if their computers are broken. Sometimes you have to press a button, install new software, or turn a computer on. If our company is doing very well, our employees can focus on most important tasks.

Hope You will last longer than previous IT guy, good luck!

WSAD/Arrows - movement

Left/Right mouse button - take/use obejct in left/right hand
